title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct identification.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any one of the following types of boundary data shown on the map.
The response correctly identifies one of the following types of data.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct identification.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any one of the following regions of the United States where most dairy farms are located.
The response correctly identifies one of the following regions of the United States where most dairy farms are located.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct identification.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any one of the following spatial patterns shown on the map.
The response correctly identifies one of the following spatial patterns shown on the map.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions:
The response does not correctly describe a characteristic of land use associated with a spatial pattern shown on the map.

· Dairy farms are associated with rural, agricultural, low-density types of land use.

The response correctly describes a characteristic of land use associated with a spatial pattern shown on the map.

· Dairy farms are associated with rural, agricultural, low-density types of land use.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Two points are earned for two correct descriptions
descriptions: The answer does not provide a correct description of any one of the following features.
The answer correctly describes ONE of the following features.
The answer correctly describes TWO of the following features.
